author: Ytbnd

content:
Eno vprašanje / opozorilo: če se ne motim je imel stock fw omejitev pri nadgradnji? Ta na smela biti večja od 3MB.

Zato je bil postopek: najprej "micro" verzija tomata (ali katerega koli drugega), potem "prava". Ko imaš enkrat neoriginalno verzijo, lahko nadgrajuješ na polnih 4MB.
author: blazko

content:
Mislil sem na tole:






	
	
		
		
			Citat:

Q: Why can't I directly upgrade from a stock Linksys firmware to DD-WRT versions other than MICRO or MINI?
A: The stock firmware from Linksys on the WRT54GL v1 and 1.1 won't accept a firmware image over 3MB in size (you will get the error: "Upgrade are failed! [sic]" if you try). So you will need to flash the micro or mini versions of DD-WRT onto the router BEFORE flashing the standard, voip, and vpn versions. Be sure to hard reset your router to restore firmware defaults both BEFORE AND AFTER you upgrade even to the micro or mini DD-WRT.
		
		Klikni za razširitev
author: blazko

content:
hvala za odgovor
na router imam obešene 4 wifi ip kamere ter ostale računalnike  in trenutno firmware ddwrt vendar se mi zdi da se obesi router.
Kaj priporočate?

author: titov

content:
Preko stock fw daj tomato victek, nato:





	
	
		
		
			Citat:

REMEMBER to execute a nvram erase through after upgrading to this version or better tick the option "After flashing, erase all data in NVRAM memory" during the upgrade process. Later configure manually again to avoid unstable behaviour. Do not restore your configuration file, some values and new values are removed/added in the nvram.
		
		Klikni za razširitev
	
http://victek.is-a-geek.com/Repositorios/TomatoRAF/Tomato_RAF_1.28.121006a.zip


Preveri kondenzatorje in napajalnik, zaradi tega zna router crkovati/slabo delati .
